channel.title: Docker on Jekst
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Jekst

item.title: Docker Webservice
item.description: 1version: '3.9'2services:3 #Redis Service4 redis:5 image: redis:alpine6 container_name: redis7 restart: on-failure8 ports:9 - "6379:6379"1011 #Nginx Service12 nginx:13 image: nginx:alpine14 container_name: nginx15 restart: on-failure16 ports:17 - "80:80"18 - "443:443"19 volumes:20 - "/Users/xxx/code/www:/usr/share/nginx/html"21 - "/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro"2223 #MySQL Service24 mysql:25 image: mysql:latest26 command: --default-authentication-plugin=mysql_native_password --character-set-server=utf8mb4 --collation-server=utf8mb4_unicode_ci27 container_name: mysql28 restart: on-failure29 tty: true30 ports:31 - "3306:3306"32 environment:33 MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: xian34 volumes:35 - "/Users/xxx/data/dbdata:/var/lib/mysql"

item.title: 自定义Docker镜像
item.description: 以制作redis镜像为例，讲一下docker镜像制作及push到仓库流程 1.编写Dockerfile 1FROMalpine:latest2# install redis3RUN apk add redis 4# expose port5EXPOSE63796# start redis server7CMD ["redis-server "]2.创建镜像 1docker build -t redis:0.0.1 . 3.登陆仓库 1docker login --username=username registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com 4.镜像打标签 1 2docker tag redis:0.0.1 registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/jekst/redis:0.0.1 5.上传镜像 1docker push registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/jekst/redis:0.0.1
